name: LifeStraw Peak Series Water Filter - 1L, Dark Mountain Gray, Protects Against Bacteria and Parasites, Ultra-Compact and Versatile
short_description: Protects against 99.999999% of bacteria (including E.coli, Salmonella), 99.999% of parasites (including Giardia and Cryptosporidium), 99.999% of microplastics, silt, sand, and cloudiness
Enhanced microfilter performance: Our re-engineered membrane and custom backwash accessory means better performance against sand and silt, maintaining great flow over the long haul
Ultra-compact, our reconfigured filter is tiny but mighty with a super packable kit that doesn’t sacrifice weight or space
Extreme durability: 2x thicker, premium materials make it tougher and ultra leak-proof

Highly versatile means the collapsible squeeze bottle system is designed with every occasion in mind; Use as a bottle, squeeze water through it into cooking containers or other drinkware, use as a straw, remove the filter to use as a storage system, or connect to other Peak Series systems
Your purchase has impact: one purchase, one child, one year of safe water
LifeStraw is proud to be a B Corp and Climate Neutral Certified brand, committed to meeting the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance, transparency and accountability
product_description: It's time to stop carrying around a bag of plastic parts and multiple water bottles. LifeStraw’s Peak compact squeeze filtration is an all-in-one water storage and filtration device. Made from premium materials, it’s durable enough to last you on your long-haul adventures without having to worry about rips, tears, and punctures. Ultralight and collapsible at less than 4 ounces, you can grab and go, using as a straw filter, storage solution, squeeze system or connecting to other Peak Series systems to best fit your adventure. The filter membrane density has been optimized for flow rate and the over-cap features and smart seal mouthpiece prevent leakage. The robust carrying feature makes it easy to connect to your pack with a carabiner or rope. Your purchase has impact: For every LifeStraw product purchased, a school child in need receives safe water for an entire school year.

name: Brita Stainless Steel Premium Filtering Water Bottle, BPA-Free, Reusable, Insulated, Replaces 300 Plastic Water Bottles, Filter Lasts 2 Months or 40 Gallons, Includes 1 Filter, Stainless - 20 oz.
short_description: FILTERED WATER DISPENSER: One 20 oz. BPA-free Brita Stainless Steel Water Bottle with one filter, a double-wall insulated bottle that stays cold for a full 24 hours
CUTS OUT IMPURITIES: Activated carbon block filter cuts the taste and odor of chlorine and also reduces particulates in drinking water; not a water purifier bottle
SUSTAINABLE: By switching to Brita, you can save money and replace up to 300 standard 16.9-oz. single-use plastic water bottles with each water bottle filter
CONVENIENT DESIGN: Features include an easy-sip straw, built-in carrying loop for portability, one-handed push-button lid and leakproof design/construction to avoid surprise spills
USE WITH REPLACEMENT FILTER: Personal water filter bottle is compatible with Brita water bottle replacement filters, which should be changed every 40 gallons or about every two months
product_description: Drink healthier, great-tasting tap water with the BPA-free Brita Stainless Steel Premium Filtering Water Bottle. This durable, double-wall insulated filtered water bottle stays cold for a full 24 hours, making it fantastic for long road trips, all-day sports tournaments or office use. The Brita water filter bottle utilizes an activated carbon block filter to cut the taste and odor of chlorine and reduce particulates in water as you drink. You can also replace 300 standard 16.9-oz. single-use plastic water bottles with just one water bottle filter. It's an easy way to stay hydrated, save money and reduce plastic waste. Created for effortless convenience, this water bottle features an enclosed, easy-sip straw, a built-in carrying loop for grab-and-go portability and a one-handed push-button lid. A leakproof water bottle design helps you avoid surprise drips and spills. This water bottle is compatible with Brita water bottle replacement filters, which should be changed every 40 gallons or about every two months. Get great taste, less waste and more savings from Brita.

name: Brita Hard-Sided Plastic Premium Filtering Water Bottle, BPA-Free, Reusable, Replaces 300 Plastic Water Bottles, Filter Lasts 2 Months or 40 Gallons, Includes 1 Filter, Night Sky - 26 oz.

product_description: Drink healthier, great-tasting tap water with the BPA-free Brita Hard-Sided Plastic Premium Filtering Water Bottle. This filtered water bottle utilizes an activated carbon block filter to cut the taste and odor of chlorine and reduce particulates in water as you drink. You can also replace 300 standard 16.9-oz. single-use plastic water bottles with just one water bottle filter. It's an easy way to stay hydrated, save money and reduce plastic waste. Created for effortless convenience, this water filter bottle features an enclosed, easy-sip straw, a built-in carrying loop for grab-and-go portability and a one-handed push-button lid. The bottle also has a leakproof design to help you avoid surprise drips and spills, and it's top rack dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning. This water bottle is compatible with Brita water bottle replacement filters, which should be changed every 40 gallons or about every two months. Get great taste, less waste and more savings from Brita.

name: Pro Water Purifier Water Purification System for Survival - High-Volume Hand Pump Portable Water Filter for Group Camping, Backpacking, Emergency Preparedness - 3-Stage Water Filtration System
short_description: Creates Fresh, Clean Water for a Big Group: This survival water filtration system removes 99.99% of the potentially harmful nastiness in water; And it doesn't just make a cup or two like similar filtration systems; it'll create enough to keep the entire group hydrated

Easily Filter a Gallon of Water in Just Minutes: Our portable water purifier has an advanced 3-stage filtration system and a jaw-dropping 1.5L per minute flow rate; This means you'll spend less time pumping and more time enjoying the beautiful outdoors

Tough-As-Nails Design Built for the Outdoors: The backpacking water filtration system is made from heavy-duty plastic that does not contain BPA or BPS; So go ahead, wander into the wilderness with confidence, knowing you'll always have access to clean water

Lean and Light, So It Won't Get in Your Way: This camping water filter system is not heavy, so it won't be a pain to carry; Also, our camping water purifier comes with a convenient carry bag that makes it even easier to bring along on your outdoor escapades

Our Focus Is On Outdoor Filtration Solutions: PP Cotton Filtration accuracy: 5 micron (µm) + Ultrafiltration accuracy: 0.01 micron (µm). With our dependable, innovative filtration systems, your only concern should be which path to head down and explore next

name: 2 Pack Water Filter Straw - Water Purifying Device - Portable Personal Water Filtration Survival - for Emergency Kits Outdoor Activities and Hiking - Water Filter Camping Travel Survival Backpacking
short_description: Compact Design: LoGest’s Prepper Supplies Portable Water Filter Straw measures 7.5” x 1.35” in size and is equipped with a carrying strap, making it life easy to transport from one location to the next so you can enjoy fresh drinking emergency water everywhere you go.

Fresh Water: Reducing the risk of infection by removing E. coli, legionella and salmonella, this water filter survival is designed to deliver fresh, pure drinking water. It’s also designed to reduce chlorine, harmful particles and bad odor to improve the taste.

Filter Purifier: Each water purifier survival Filter Straw is designed with a hollow fiber membrane to effectively remove 99% of harmful bacteria at 0.1-micron filtration. Do not use it to remove salt from seawater or chemical contaminated water.

Multipurpose Use: Easy to carry and use, the LoGest Water purification Filter Straw survival gear and equipment can be used when traveling, playing sports, hiking water filter, camping water filter, engaging in outdoor work, during a natural disaster, for emergencies and so much more.

Long Lifespan: Even though the Water Filter Backpacking Straw is small in size, it boasts a 1500-liter filter capacity so you can enjoy using it for more than a year! Best of all, the package includes two survival water filter so you always have a spare on hand.

name: LifeStraw Go Series Water Filter Bottle - BPA-Free, Removes Bacteria, Parasites, Microplastics, Improves Taste, 22oz, Aegean Sea
short_description: LifeStraw Go Series is the ULTIMATE SIDEKICK. The BPA-Free bottle filters out nasties so you can fill up from airport bathrooms, a tap in Mexico, or a gas station while road-tripping
IMPROVES TASTE: the Carbon filter reduces chlorine, odors + organic chemical matter

FILTERS OUT CONTAMINANTS: the Membrane microfilter protects against 99.999999% Bacteria (including E.coli + Salmonella), 99.999% Parasites (including Giardia and Cryptosporidium), 99.999% Microplastics, sand, dirt, and cloudiness
LONG LASTING: The membrane microfilter lasts up to 1,000 gal (4,000 L) - about five years of daily use. Carbon filter lasts up to 26 gallons (100 L) - about two months
SAVES WASTE: The membrane microfilter lasts up to 4,000 liters. That’s 8,000 single use plastic water bottles out of our parks, our oceans, and our communities
product_description: LifeStraw Go Series is the ultimate sidekick for safer, better-tasting water for travel and everyday use. The BPA-free bottle filters out nasties, so you can fill up from airport bathrooms, a tap in Mexico, or a gas station while road-tripping. The advanced 2-stage filter improves taste and protects against bacteria, parasites, microplastics, chlorine, silt, sand, and cloudiness. The BPA-free bottle is made from 50% post -consumer recycled plastic. Do good on the go and avoid single-use plastic bottles. For every purchase, a child in need receives to safe drinking water for a year.

name: Katadyn Hiker Pro Hand Pump Water Filter for Backpacking, Camping, Emergency Survival
short_description: CAMPING, BACKPACKING & SURVIVAL WATER FILTER: AntiClogTM, 0.2-micron glass fiber filter reliably removes 99.9999% of bacteria, 99.9% of protozoa, cysts, algae, spores, and sediments from clear to muddy water. An active carbon core reduces unpleasant tastes and odors.

EASY TO CLEAN IN THE FIELD: Unlike other water filter systems, the Hiker Pro can be cleaned while camping, backpacking, hiking, or for survival in an emergency. Simply remove the filter from the body and swish in clear water to avoid clogging and ensure a consistent output.

NAMED EASIEST TO USE BY US RETAILERS: The comfortable, ergonomic handle allows you to filter more water with less effort. Also comes with quick-connect hoses and a bottle adaptor makes for easy connection to most water bottles and hydration bladders.

FAST FLOW RATE: The large filter surface of 271 cm2 (107 square inches), enables a flow rate of 1L per minute, with approximately ~48 pumps. Filters an average of 300 gallons before needing a replacement. Ideal for use by 1-2 people.

LIGHT & COMPACT: At just 11 ounces, Hiker Pro is highly portable so you can enjoy fresh water on your next ultralight backpacking, hiking, or camping adventure. The manual pumping method also makes it perfect for emergency or survival kits. Storage bag included
product_description: When you are out on a long adventure, this compact filter can deliver a liter of fresh, enjoyable water from a lake, river, or creek in only a minute. Removes bacteria, giardia, and cryptosporidium. The activated carbon granulate reduces unpleasant tastes. With the quick-connect fittings, you can filter clean water directly into a bottle or pack reservoir. The filter connects to the most popular water bottles and is compatible with hydration systems. The filter protector can be cleaned in the field easily and effortlessly, thus guaranteeing quick access to safe drinking water even in turbid waters. The new, transparent design allows users to follow the flow of the water and the filtering process. The capacity of this filter is up to 1,150 liters (300 gallons), depending on the water quality.

name: Personal Water Filter, Straw Water Purifier System, Outdoor Portable Water Filter Straw, Emergency Survival Gear for Hiking Camping Accessories Travel Fishing Emergency Preparedness
short_description: 【Food Grade Material】Build out of strong food-grade plastics, manufactured with BPA-Free ABS, very safe, With a filtration accuracy of 0.01 micron, 99.9999% of harmful substances can be filtered out by simply inserting the filter, providing you with a reliable source of pure drinking water anytime, anywhere. Perfect for camping, hiking, or emergencies.

【Easy To Use】Get down close to the stream or lake and use it to drink straight from the source, or fill your water bottle and insert the filter to start sipping. The flow rate is about 550ml/min, filters a total of 1,320 gallons (5,000 litres) of water. After multiple uses, simply backflush the straw to keep it clean and prevent clogging.

【Lightweight】Ultralight & Backpack-Ready Weighing under 3.5oz, this survival straw fits in pockets or attaches to backpacks effortlessly. Its compact design and water bag compatibility make it ideal for outdoor adventures like trekking, backpacking, or gravity-fed filtration systems.

【Wide application】No other accessories are needed, the water filter can be directly connected to a drinking bag, bottle or outdoor water source, providing safe drinking water for you and your family's outdoor adventures.
【Water Filter Straw Kit】Compatible water filter*1; Universal PET bottle Adapter*1; Food grade silicone Pipe*1; Hook*1, Food-grade materials greatly increase service life,

name: Purewell 2.25G Gravity Water Filter System with Water Level Window, 3-Stage 0.01μm Ultra-Filtration Stainless Steel Countertop System with 2 Filters and Stand, Reduce 99% Chlorine, PW-KS
short_description: Water Level Window - This Purewell stainless steel filtration system features a transparent window, allowing you to easily monitor the water level without having to open it.

3-Stage Filtration - Purewell gravity water filter system adopts a composite filter technology, can effectively minimize a broad array of contaminants. The black carbon filter utilizes a 0.01μm hollow fiber UF membrane, a silver ion membrane, and an activated carbon block designed to reduce chlorine and intercept rust, sediment, organic matter and heavy metals.

Precision Filtration with Smaller Pore Size - Boasting a filter pore size of just 0.01 microns, the Purewell gravity water filter efficiently sieves out 99.99% of minuscule materials from the water, while other brands offer only a 0.2 microns filter pore size. Smaller filter pore size equates to enhanced filtration accuracy. Impressively, despite this microscopic pore size, the Purewell water filter system retains an optimal flow rate of 4 gallons per hour.

Energy Efficient - Operating on the principle of gravity filtration, this system requires no electricity. The Purewell gravity water filter system comprises upper and lower chambers: the former for unfiltered tap water and the latter for collecting filtered water. Its no-electricity requirement makes it versatile for both indoor and outdoor use. NOTE: Avoid adding tap water to the top chamber when the bottom chamber is filled with filtered water to prevent leakage.

Durable and Replaceable - The pair of black carbon filters provides up to 6000 gallons of drinkable water, with each filter element serving up to 3000 gallons (lifespan may vary depending on water quality). For optimal performance, it's recommended to replace the filter elements every 6 months. Please note: This system does NOT lower the TDS value.
